scripts.install-all: cd agents/niche-agent && npm install && cd ../vision-agent && npm install && cd ../speaker-agent && npm install && cd ../quiz-agent && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.start-all: concurrently "cd agents/niche-agent && npm start" "cd agents/vision-agent && npm start" "cd agents/speaker-agent && npm start" "cd agents/quiz-agent && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
